attributes.action: Make Nigel Farage a member of the team negotiating the UK exit from the EU
attributes.additional_details:
Nigel Farage has worked tirelessly on behalf of the UK, to secure a referendum initially, and subsequently campaigning for the leave side.
To be excluded from the exit negotiation now would leave the efforts of the team appointed by the government open to question, as many firmly supported the remain campaign, and may be contrary to the wishes of the British people
attributes.background: Nigel Farage needs to be a leading member of the UK team negotiating the exit from the EU
